Summary: Extremely bright diamond shaped light moving north
divs: sighting detailsi admit i had been drinking. my friends and i had been star gazing practically all night at the lake in rural missouri. we saw several shooting stars and airplanes. i stopped drinking from 2:00am - 4:00am so i could drive back home to st. louis. i was sober at 4:00am. at approximatley 4:00a.m., i walked to my car to leave, and i saw something bright out of the corner of my eye in the northern sky. i looked up\over, and it was a huge (compared to airplanes, stars and planets) white light diamond shape moving rather fast, south to north. i called my girlfriend to come see it, and she saw it too. we were both freaked out. and then it disappeared over the the next hill's treetops abrutly. i tried to tell myself it was a satellite, but i looked up what they look like, typed in "diamond shaped light" and ufos popped up. i thought it was moving in a straight line, but my friend said she thought it looked like it jumped, but that may have been due to her still having a beer in her hand at 4:00am, and it being behind a big tree and the branches may have been moving. it scared me.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ste. Genevieve
This sighting has never been favorited.
